CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 11, 1961, pg. 1 reads: "New Foreman - John A. Thomas Jr., 18th Ward Democratic district committeeman, right center, was appointed streets maintenance foreman, a $6,500 post, by Frank (Bangy) Ambrose, left, superintendent of the Division of Bridges, Highways and Sewers, last Friday. Mayor Joseph Barr reads: letter of appointment as Councilman James A. Jordon looks on.  City Controller Edward R. Frey, who is the 18th ward chairman, sponsored Thomas for the job.  See story on Page 2. - Harris PHoto."
TitMainTitle: Frank (Bangy) Ambrose, Mayor Joseph Barr reading letter of appointment to streets maintenance foreman to John A. Thomas Jr., and Councilman James A. Jordon, standing in Mayor's office
